body.p: The affiant T. B. Pool states that he is a practiceing Physician in Caldwell County Ky & has been for many years & states that he is acquainted with Chas, Hooper who is indicted in the Caldwell Circuit Court, and affiant states that Hooper is a good young man & that his parents are very honest respectable citizens

T, B, Pool
J. N. T.
Feb 27/65
Subscribed & sworne to by P. B. Pool before me This the 27" of Feb 1865

J. N. Turner P J
T. B Pool
Febary 65

The affiant W. H. Pool States that he is a citizen of Caldwell County, and has resided in Said county, for Several years and that he is well and intimately acquainted with Charles Hooper who is indicted in the Caldwell Circuit Court and affiant States that Hooper is a good young man & that his Parents are very honest & Respectable Citizens

W. H. Pool
W H P
1865

Subscribed and Sworn to before me by W H Pool this 27" day of Feby 1865,,
J. N. T
Feb 27 1865
